title: Interview with Krista St. Germain
itunes:title: Interview with Krista St. Germain
description:
Today is a very special podcast. I interview Krista St. Germain on the topic of grief. She coaches widowed moms in her business, and we apply her coaching concepts to weightloss, specifically grieving friendships as you lose weight, grieving foods you longer eat, and more.
 
Get the Free Course here:
http://phit.click/freecourse
